name: American Cancer Society: Discovery Shop (Pleasanton)
description: Thrift store accepting donations; proceeds support cancer research and patient programs
fullDescription: The American Cancer Society Discovery Shop in Pleasanton has two locations in the same shopping center, selling quality secondhand and vintage items with proceeds supporting cancer research.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept accessories and housewares
- Accept linens and furniture
- Accept collectibles and vintage items
- Affordable thrift shopping
- Proceeds fund cancer research
howToGetIt:
1. Visit either location at Santa Rita Rd, Pleasanton
2. Donate gently used items
3. Or shop for affordable goods
4. Open Mon-Sun 10am-6pm
5. Call (925) 462-7374 for info
keywords: ACS, American Cancer Society, Discovery Shop, Pleasanton, thrift store, donate clothes, secondhand, vintage, charity shop, clothing donation, furniture donation
